        public void initDefaultCommand()
        Specified by:
        initDefaultCommand in class Subsystem

      • tankDrive

        public void tankDrive(double left,
             double right)
        Tank drive: makes the robot move.
        Parameters:
        left - Speed for the left motors.
        right - Speed for the right motors.

      • arcadeControlledDrive

        public void arcadeControlledDrive(double moveValue,
                         double rotateValue)
        Drives, actively compensating for drift.
        Parameters:
        moveValue - Speed for forward movement.
        rotateValue - Speed for turning. PID controlled.

      • arcadeDrive

        public void arcadeDrive(double moveValue,
               double rotateValue)
        Arcade drive: drives using a turn value and move value.
        Parameters:
        moveValue - The speed at which the robot will move forward and backward.
        rotateValue - The speed at which the robot will turn. Right values are right turns.

      • brake

        public void brake()
        Stops the robot. May make use of encoder-based PID, for now it just sets speed to zero.

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        Gets the robot's speed. Only really works when not turning.
        Returns:
        Speed in meters / second.

      • getTurnValue

        protected double getTurnValue()

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Gets the robot's distance travelled since last reset. Only really works when not turning.
        Returns:
        Distance in meters.

      • resetDistance

        public void resetDistance()
        Resets the robot's distance travelled.
